mapper.select: SELECT REQ_ID, TRT_CD, INS_NO, MAIN_INS_NO_BF, MAIN_INS_FLG_BF, INS_SBT_BF, MAIN_INS_NO_AF, MAIN_INS_FLG_AF, INS_SBT_AF, INS_SHA_YMD, INS_SHA_ID, UPD_SHA_YMD, UPD_SHA_ID FROM T_RDM_HCO_LNK_NXT_REQ WHERE REQ_ID = #{reqId}

SELECT KNR.TEKIYO_YMD , CDM.VALUE1_KANJ AS ACTION , '-' AS TRT_NM , '武田紐' AS HIN_G_NM , MST.INS_ABBR_NAME , MST.INS_ADDR FROM M_RDM_COM_CAL_USR CAL -- RDM用カレンダー(オンライン用) INNER JOIN T_RDM_HCO_LNK_NXT_REQ NXT -- 武田紐親子_来期用_申請管理 ON NXT.INS_NO = #{inInsNo} AND NXT.TRT_CD = '00' INNER JOIN T_RDM_REQ_KNR KNR -- 申請管理 ON KNR.REQ_ID = NXT.REQ_ID AND KNR.REQ_TYPE IN ('11', '12', '13') AND KNR.REQ_STS IN ('04', '14') AND KNR.TEKIYO_YMD > CAL.CAL_DATE LEFT JOIN M_RDM_HCO_MST MST -- 施設_基本情報 ON MST.INS_NO = NXT.MAIN_INS_NO_AF LEFT JOIN M_RDM_CODE_MST CDM -- コード情報 ON CDM.CODE_NAME = 'REQ_KBN' AND CDM.DEL_FLG = '0' AND CDM.VALUE1 = KNR.REQ_TYPE WHERE 1=1 AND CAL.TODAY = '1' ORDER BY TEKIYO_YMD ASC, APR_YMDHMS ASC

WITH TRT_PRD_G AS ( SELECT TRT.TRT_GRP_CD , PRD.TRT_CD , TRT.TRT_NM , PRD.HIN_G_CD , PRD.HIN_G_NAME , MIN(TRT.DISP_SORT) AS TRT_DISP_SORT , MIN(PRD.DISP_SORT) AS PRD_DISP_SORT FROM M_RDM_COM_CAL_USR CAL -- RDM用カレンダー(オンライン用) LEFT JOIN S_RDM_COM_LNK_TRT_PRDGRP_PRD PRD -- 領域別品目グループ品目 ON 1=1 AND PRD.TEKIYO_START_DATE <= CAL.CAL_DATE AND PRD.TEKIYO_END_DATE >= CAL.CAL_DATE LEFT JOIN S_RDM_COM_LNK_TRTGRP_TRT TRT -- 領域グループ・領域関連定義 ON 1=1 AND TRT.TRT_CD = PRD.TRT_CD AND TRT.TEKIYO_START_DATE <= CAL.CAL_DATE AND TRT.TEKIYO_END_DATE >= CAL.CAL_DATE WHERE 1=1 AND CAL.TODAY = '1' GROUP BY TRT.TRT_GRP_CD , PRD.TRT_CD , TRT.TRT_NM , PRD.HIN_G_CD , PRD.HIN_G_NAME
UNION
SELECT 'Z' , '00' , '-' , 'Z' , '武田紐' , 0 , 0 FROM DUAL ), REQ_INF AS ( SELECT LNK.REQ_ID , LNK.TRT_CD , LNK.HIN_G_CD , LNK.INS_NO , CASE LNK.MAIN_INS_FLG_AF WHEN 'Z' THEN LNK.MAIN_INS_NO_BF ELSE LNK.MAIN_INS_NO_AF END AS MAIN_INS_NO FROM T_RDM_HCO_LNK_REQ LNK -- 領域品目グループ別親子_申請管理 WHERE LNK.INS_NO = #{inInsNo}
UNION
SELECT NXT.REQ_ID , NXT.TRT_CD , 'Z' AS HIN_G_CD , NXT.INS_NO , CASE NXT.MAIN_INS_FLG_AF WHEN 'Z' THEN NXT.MAIN_INS_NO_BF ELSE NXT.MAIN_INS_NO_AF END AS MAIN_INS_NO FROM T_RDM_HCO_LNK_NXT_REQ NXT -- 武田紐親子_来期用_申請管理 WHERE NXT.INS_NO = #{inInsNo} )
SELECT KNR.TEKIYO_YMD , CDM.VALUE1_KANJ AS ACTION , TRT_PRD_G.TRT_CD , TRT_PRD_G.TRT_NM , TRT_PRD_G.HIN_G_CD , TRT_PRD_G.HIN_G_NAME AS HIN_G_NM , MST.INS_ABBR_NAME , MST.INS_ADDR , REQ_INF.MAIN_INS_NO FROM M_RDM_COM_CAL_USR CAL -- RDM用カレンダー(オンライン用) INNER JOIN REQ_INF -- サブクエリ（親子紐申請情報） ON REQ_INF.INS_NO = #{inInsNo} LEFT JOIN T_RDM_REQ_KNR KNR -- 申請管理 ON KNR.REQ_ID = REQ_INF.REQ_ID AND KNR.REQ_TYPE IN ('11', '12', '13') AND KNR.REQ_STS IN ('04', '14') AND KNR.TEKIYO_YMD > CAL.CAL_DATE LEFT JOIN M_RDM_HCO_MST MST -- 施設_基本情報 ON MST.INS_NO = REQ_INF.MAIN_INS_NO LEFT JOIN M_RDM_CODE_MST CDM -- コード情報 ON CDM.CODE_NAME = 'REQ_KBN' AND CDM.DEL_FLG = '0' AND CDM.VALUE1 = KNR.REQ_TYPE LEFT JOIN TRT_PRD_G -- サブクエリ（領域・品目グループ） ON TRT_PRD_G.TRT_CD = REQ_INF.TRT_CD AND TRT_PRD_G.HIN_G_CD = REQ_INF.HIN_G_CD WHERE 1=1 AND CAL.TODAY = '1' ORDER BY TRT_DISP_SORT ASC , PRD_DISP_SORT ASC , KNR.TEKIYO_YMD ASC , KNR.APR_YMDHMS ASC

SELECT HCO.REQ_ID -- 武田紐親子_来期用_申請管理.申請ID FROM T_RDM_HCO_LNK_NXT_REQ HCO --- 武田紐親子_来期用_申請管理 INNER JOIN T_RDM_REQ_KNR KNR ---申請管理 ON 1=1 AND HCO.REQ_ID = KNR.REQ_ID AND KNR.REQ_TYPE IN ('11', '12') AND KNR.REQ_STS IN ('03','13','04','14') WHERE 1=1 AND HCO.INS_NO = #{insNo} AND HCO.REQ_ID <> #{reqId}

SELECT HCO.REQ_ID -- 武田紐親子_来期用_申請管理.申請ID FROM T_RDM_HCO_LNK_NXT_REQ HCO --- 武田紐親子_来期用_申請管理 INNER JOIN T_RDM_REQ_KNR KNR ---申請管理 ON 1=1 AND HCO.REQ_ID = KNR.REQ_ID AND KNR.REQ_TYPE IN ('11', '12', '13') AND KNR.REQ_STS IN ('03','13','04','14') WHERE 1=1 AND HCO.INS_NO = #{insNo} AND HCO.REQ_ID <> #{reqId}
mapper.update: UPDATE T_RDM_HCO_LNK_NXT_REQ SET MAIN_INS_NO_AF = #{mainInsNoAf}, INS_SBT_AF = #{insSbtAf}, UPD_SHA_YMD = #{updShaYmd}, UPD_SHA_ID = #{updShaId} WHERE REQ_ID = #{reqId}
UPDATE T_RDM_HCO_LNK_NXT_REQ SET MAIN_INS_NO_AF = #{mainInsNoAf}, INS_SBT_AF = #{insSbtAf}, INS_SBT_AF = null, UPD_SHA_YMD = #{updShaYmd}, UPD_SHA_ID = #{updShaId} WHERE REQ_ID = #{reqId}
mapper.select: SELECT HCO.REQ_ID -- 武田紐親子_来期用_申請管理.申請ID FROM T_RDM_HCO_LNK_NXT_REQ HCO --- 武田紐親子_来期用_申請管理 INNER JOIN T_RDM_REQ_KNR KNR ---申請管理 ON 1=1 AND HCO.REQ_ID = KNR.REQ_ID AND KNR.REQ_TYPE IN ('11') AND KNR.REQ_STS IN ('03','13','04','14') WHERE 1=1 AND HCO.INS_NO = #{insNo}
